abstract: Bank of America plans to press ahead with its $4 billion takeover of Countrywide Financial, the mortgage lender under F.B.I. investigation for possible securities fraud.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America plans to press ahead with its $4 billion takeover of Countrywide Financial, the mortgage lender under F.B.I. investigation for possible securities fraud.

headline.main: Bank of America Plans to Move Ahead With Countrywide Deal
